reviews.review_msg: Aaron is a solid professor for the plant content in the class. His lectures are clear and well-organized. He also goes over exam content beforehand so you will always be prepared for the midterm. Always willing to answer questions and help in case some material confuses you.
Makes learning plants interesting, very straight forward on what will be on the exams.

I hate plants but Aron Weir made it actually interesting and taught it in a way that was easy to learn. Tests were super straightforward. Super enjoyable class that I would highly recommend to any science major. 100% would take again and one of my favourite classes and profs at SFU so far.
Aron is awesome! His midterms were pretty straightforward, no tricks as he mentioned. I hope he continues teaching!

Aron is a great professor, he was always available to help students and was always open to questions during lectures. Exams were not too hard, and the content was fairly straightforward. I must say, the course was a bit boring, but that might be because it is my fourth time learning about photosynthesis.

SFU should def make him a permanent prof and not just a sessional. I literally hate plant biology with every ounce of my body but Aron made it super easy and fun to learn. His lectures were super engaging and clear, and he's super lenient with marking and gives part marks for answers! Take him if you have a chance. Also sfu pls let him teach 337 :D

His lectures are clear and comprehensible, and he is super approachable to go to for help. His lectures are clear, and exams have no surprises, but definitely still study for a good mark. I would say he is an easy prof but the material can be a bit challenging but he makes his lectures very engaging and I look forward going to his class.

Prof. Weir is fantastic! Despite initial concerns about the lack of reviews, taking his course was definitely a great decision. His engaging lectures effectively break down and explain concepts. The exams are fair; focus on the learning objectives and pre-lecture readings for success!
